mapper.sql: CODE_ID, CODE_TYPE, CODE_CD, CODE_NAME, USE_YN, REMARK, OPTION01, OPTION02, OPTION03, OPTION04, OPTION05, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into tb_common_code (CODE_ID, CODE_TYPE, CODE_CD, CODE_NAME, USE_YN, REMARK, OPTION01, OPTION02, OPTION03, OPTION04, OPTION05, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{codeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{codeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into tb_common_code
CODE_ID,
CODE_TYPE,
CODE_CD,
CODE_NAME,
USE_YN,
REMARK,
OPTION01,
OPTION02,
OPTION03,
OPTION04,
OPTION05,
CREATE_TIME
#{codeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{codeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{codeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{codeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
now()
mapper.update:
update tb_common_code
CODE_TYPE = #{codeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_CD = #{codeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_NAME = #{codeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USE_YN = #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION01 = #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION02 = #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION03 = #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION04 = #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION05 = #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = now()
where CODE_ID = #{codeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_common_code set CODE_TYPE = #{codeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE_CD = #{codeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE_NAME = #{codeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USE_YN = #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION01 = #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION02 = #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION03 = #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION04 = #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION05 = #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where CODE_ID = #{codeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS RN ,T1.CODE_ID ,T1.CODE_TYPE ,T1.CODE_CD ,T1.CODE_NAME ,T1.REMARK ,T1.USE_YN ,T1.USE_YN AS STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.USE_YN = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.USE_YN = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_COMMON_CODE T1 ORDER BY CODE_TYPE,CODE_CD

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS RN ,T1.CODE_ID ,T1.CODE_TYPE ,T1.CODE_CD ,T1.CODE_NAME ,T1.REMARK ,T1.USE_YN ,T1.USE_YN AS STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.USE_YN = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.USE_YN = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_COMMON_CODE T1 WHERE T1.CODE_ID = #{codeId}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS RN ,T1.CODE_ID ,T1.CODE_TYPE ,T1.CODE_CD ,T1.CODE_NAME ,T1.REMARK ,T1.USE_YN ,T1.USE_YN AS STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.USE_YN = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.USE_YN = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_COMMON_CODE T1 WHERE T1.CODE_TYPE = #{codeType}
